H0.text: who 's the original singer of help me make it through the night. Willie Nelson

H1.text: who 's the original singer of help me make it through the night. Johnny Cash

H2.text: who 's the original singer of help me make it through the night. Waylon Jennings

H3.text: who 's the original singer of help me make it through the night. Kris Kristofferson

A4.text: The song had been composed by Kris Kristofferson, who had recorded the only other previous version of the song.

A5.text: Kristofferson appeared with Rita Coolidge on the BBC television series The Old Grey Whistle Test, performing 'Help Me Make It Through the Night'.
